summary:
- Collaborate with a cross-functional team of Product Managers, Engineers, Architects, and UX Designers to write high-quality, developer-centered content.
- Develop and maintain user-centric technical documentation, including tutorials, API documentation, and user guides. 
- Conduct SME interviews and transform technical insights into clear, concise, and user-friendly documentation. 
- Design visuals, diagrams, and code examples to improve comprehension of complex workflows. 
- Manage content governance, ensuring timely updates to reflect platform changes, new features, and evolving best practices.

- Served as product owner for all end-user and developer documentation, including REST API docs, how-to guides, and platform onboarding flows.
- Coordinated with the Information Security team to create technical responses for RFPs and renewal inquiries, ensuring accuracy and compliance. 
- Led the restructuring of user-facing product documentation, transitioning from single-use resources to a task-based, modular content model. 
- Reviewed marketing content for technical accuracy and clarity, enforcing the company style guide to maintain consistent tone and terminology while strengthening product messaging.

- Created and maintained customer-facing documentation including template guides, user stories, feature overviews, and knowledge base articles, ensuring clarity and alignment with UX and product design standards.
- Partnered with Marketing, Product, Design, and Engineering teams to develop internal process documentation, streamlining cross-team knowledge sharing.
- Produced training resources and onboarding materials to improve user adoption and internal product knowledge.
- Applied content organization and information architecture principles to ensure documentation was easily searchable and accessible.
